name: Studienvereinigung Kartellrecht e.V.
goal: We are an association of German, Austrian and Swiss lawyers with a special interest in antitrust law. We encourage an intensive exchange of information and experience between our members, with the competition authorities and cartel courts, and with university law faculties. For this purpose, we organise working meetings, conferences and events for small groups of participants.
euInitiatives: Main EU initiatives, policies and legislative files currently followed by our Organisation is Competition policy
